name: Update firmware

progressUpdates.statusUpdate: Staging failed due to a failure of the firmware update operation on interconnects/drive enclosures.

taskErrors.message: Firmware update failed during staging on SAS interconnect(s) {"name":"CZJ9260730, interconnect 4","uri":"/rest/sas-interconnects/TWT012W03L"} and drive enclosure(s) {"name":"CZJ9260730, bay 7","uri":"/rest/drive-enclosures/CN700310NX"}.
recommendedActions: Soft reset the interconnect(s), [{"name":"CZJ9260730, interconnect 1","uri":"/rest/sas-interconnects/TWT012W0F4"}, {"name":"CZJ9260730, interconnect 4","uri":"/rest/sas-interconnects/TWT012W03L"}], in the logical interconnect and retry the operation.If problem persists, power off the server profiles, [{"name":"5 server profile(s)","uri":"/rest/server-profiles/8de1954a-14b5-4eff-b4d0-f48a5c3e69ca?f_q=QGPTESXIHV05_Bay5 OR QGPTESXIHV02_Bay2 OR QGPTESXIHV01_Bay1 OR QGPTESXIHV03_Bay3 OR QGPTESXIHV04_Bay4"}], reset the drive enclosure(s), [{"name":"CZJ9260730, bay 7","uri":"/rest/drive-enclosures/CN700310NX"}], and retry the operation.if the problem persists, contact your authorized support representative and provide a support dump.

taskStatus: Interconnects are partially staged for logical interconnect LEG-QGPTSYN01-LIG-QGPTSYN01-SAS-1.
